title: Character Modules - Multiview IK + VR IK
description: A Character Blueprint to handle view switching between 1st and 3rd person with feet IK and Aim Offset.  Also including VR IK, multiplayer support and crouching foot IK.
longDescription:
Character Modules - Multiview IK + VR IK is part of a collection of packs from Blazar Games.Â These packs all contain useful features that can be used along or combined together - each pack is fully modular and fits each other seamlessly with no or very little code required to implement (any code changes will be described in the description of the pack).


With this pack you will get a character that is designed to get you going on your projects without spending days/weeks setting up the basics of your character.


The pack uses 1 character Blueprint and 1 Anim Set to handle all the features of this pack and is designed for the UE4 Skeleton.


Primary Features:

  • Toggle between 1st and 3rd person modes at the press of a button
  • 3rd person Aim offsets applied in 3rd person mode
  • Feet IK for stairs and slopes including crouching
  • VR IK for upper body, arms and hands
  • Multiplayer enabled


For a preview video please visit: https://youtu.be/21rlCWvZLrc


A Demo is available here: www.blazargames.com/Multiview_Character_Demo.zip

Press V to toggle 3rd/1st Person, R/Left motion controller analogue stick click to reset the view in VR for body alignment.





Other packs in the Character Modules collection include:


  • Character Modules - VR Hands: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/character-modules-vr-hands


Try Multiview IK pack and the VR_Hands packs combined demo here: http://www.blazargames.com/downloads/CM_MultiviewIK+VR_Hands_Demo.zip
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints: 1 Character and 1 Animation

Input: Gamepad, Keyboard + Mouse, Motion controls.

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Oculus Rift (others should without any problems but I not able to test)

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Oculus Rift (others should without any problems but I not able to test)

Documentation: Tutorials included in download pack
